hero.title: Hi, my name is
hero.subtitle: Development of functional and scalable web systems
hero.description: I am a Computer Systems Engineer with experience building digital solutions that automate processes and improve business efficiency.

about.text1: I am a Computer Systems Engineer with more than 3 years of experience in web development, specialized in the creation of functional, scalable systems oriented to solve real business needs.
about.text2: I have worked on the implementation of ERP systems, quoting platforms, multilingual websites, and solutions that integrate software with electronic devices, contributing to process automation and improved operational efficiency.
about.text3: I specialize in technologies such as Laravel, PHP, JavaScript, Bootstrap, jQuery, and MySQL, and have experience integrating REST APIs to connect systems with external services and hardware. I have also collaborated on digital marketing and content management strategies to improve companies' reach and online presence.
about.text4: I am a proactive person, focused on results, with a strong orientation to continuous improvement and teamwork. I always seek to provide solutions that generate a positive impact on the processes and objectives of each project.
about.text5: These are some of the technologies I have been able to work with:

experience.encer_text1: Responsible for the development, optimization, and maintenance of multiple web systems using technologies such as Laravel, PHP, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, and Bootstrap.
experience.encer_text2: I have developed systems that consume APIs to integrate with various electronic devices, facilitating communication between software and hardware.
experience.salvagno_text1: I developed a quoting system in Laravel that eliminated the use of Word and Excel files, centralizing the entire process on a single web platform.
experience.salvagno_text2: This solution improved data consistency, avoided errors due to manual handover, and significantly streamlined the sales workflow.
experience.salvagno_text3: I used technologies such as Laravel, Bootstrap, jQuery and JavaScript to build an intuitive and efficient interface for recording and controlling quotes.
experience.ag3_text1: I led the layout and frontend development of a multilingual corporate website, integrating essential information about services and tours. Technologies used: Laravel, Bootstrap and JavaScript.
experience.ag3_text2: I also managed and updated the content on social networks, improving the image of the company. Implemented digital marketing strategies achieving a significant increase in customer acquisition.
experience.smapac_text1: I developed a system using Laravel, Bootstrap, and JavaScript that integrated three key processes: creating requisitions, updating purchase orders, and registering products in inventory.
experience.smapac_text2: This solution significantly improved operational efficiency, reducing the time spent on registration and updating by 50%, which facilitated a more agile and accurate management of daily operations.
experience.hitzone_text1: I made the layout and development of a customer control system to facilitate the registration of users and manage their monthly payments. Technologies used: NodeJs, Bootstrap and DataTables.
experience.hitzone_text2: His old record with paper and pencil was automated, obtaining an 80% increase in performance.
experience.cbta_text1: I designed and developed a website to expose the different specialties that the school has. Technologies used: HTML, CSS and JS.
experience.cbta_text2: I performed preventive and corrective maintenance of the computer center area.
experience.cbta_text3: The creation of the website achieved that more people could know the educational offer of the institution.

projects.description_morty: A web application that consumes the Rick and Morty API. Includes search bar, pagination, filters, and dynamic routing.
projects.description_ag3: Meet this web application created to book tourist transportation services in the city of Cancun.
projects.description_olympia: Website to find accommodation options, including hotels and resorts. He helped me put into practice what I learned in React.
projects.description_medicom: This website contains the most important data of a hospital, such as its trajectory, the medical departments and the team of doctors.
projects.description_todos: Web application built in React to be able to create, complete and delete TODOs using data persistence with localStorage.
projects.description_interio: Web project where I put into practice all the skills I have acquired in layout and also the optimization of elements.
projects.description_fylo: Develop this webpage to meet a Frontend Mentor challenge about a cloud storage application.
projects.description_uniqlo: A simple and minimalist website that simulates a virtual store. I put into practice the animation of elements using ScrollReveal.
projects.description_motosport: Web page that includes different data on sports motorcycles. Personally, it was the project that I enjoyed building the most.
projects.description_patronis: One of the first websites I built using Bootstrap. I learned a lot about the grid system.
